about.title: About
about.body: Stella Real Estate helps you discover properties that fit your lifestyle. This starter is intentionally minimal so you can move fast.

hero.title: The operating system for modern real estate empires.
hero.subtitle: Employee control centers, a CRM that bends reality, a choreographed work graph, cinematic websites, and an automation fabric that smokes everything else on the market. Built in Brazil. Designed to dominate globally.

pillars.title: Platform Pillars
pillars.subtitle: Everything runs on a unified data core. No duplicate entries. No brittle integrations. Just outrageous speed and clarity for brokerages that refuse to be average.

constelacao.subtitle: The revenue galaxy
constelacao.title: Constelação CRM
constelacao.description: Every relationship, every deal, every whisper of intent captured in a single constellation of truth. Pipeline AI, forecasting rituals, and automations so aggressive they make legacy CRMs look like fax machines. Yes — it absolutely takes a fat shit on anything built in 1999.
bullets: Lead-to-close journeys with predictive nudges and auto-generated next steps
Client dossiers blending listings, contracts, communications, and financials
Governance-grade access controls with enterprise audit trails baked in

bale.subtitle: Flows with choreography
bale.title: Balé Task Orchestrator
bale.description: Balé is our Asana-level command center tuned for high-velocity brokerage teams. Every move is choreographed: recurring plays, dependency-aware timelines, approval runs, and AI briefings that keep the entire troupe in sync.
bullets: List, board, timeline, workload, and portfolio views on a single data spine
Forms, playbook bundles, and automation recipes that launch projects in seconds
Native proofing, time tracking, and executive reporting without spreadsheet gymnastics

sites.subtitle: 100+ launch-ready experiences
sites.title: Stella Sites
sites.description: A website builder where Shopify, Weebly, and WordPress had a prodigy baby trained exclusively on ultra-premium real estate. Drag, drop, and ship a cinematic brokerage site in minutes — no agency retainers, no compromise.
bullets: Curated library of 100+ high-converting templates localized for LATAM luxury buyers
Inventory sync with Constelação CRM and Balé so listings, projects, and case studies stay fresh automatically
Built-in SEO, analytics, lead capture, and multi-language storytelling out of the box

stack.title: The Stella Stack for unstoppable operators.
stack.subtitle: From recruitment into onboarding, from first showing to notarized deed — every tool you touch talks to every other. Automations, command centers, creative tools, data intelligence. Stella is the house where real estate teams actually live.

unifiedLogin.title: Unified Employee Login
unifiedLogin.description: A cockpit for every Stella teammate: permissions, documents, listings, performance dashboards, and dev ops support stitched together in a single secure session.

socialStudio.title: Social Studio
socialStudio.description: Publish-worthy carousels, shorts, and reels generated from your listings, then auto-posted to every network with agent-level personalization.

calendar.title: Calendar Intelligence
calendar.description: Two-way sync across Google, Outlook, iCloud, and CRM timelines. Balé fills the agenda; Constelação knows the stakes. No more double-booked viewings.

docVault.title: Document Vault + eSign
docVault.description: Contracts, disclosures, CAD files, and marketing collateral stored with version history, approvals, and DocuSign-ready envelopes.

analytics.title: Analytics & Revenue Command
analytics.description: Real-time dashboards for pipeline velocity, campaign ROI, agent performance, and absorption forecasts — all straight from the platform's beating heart.

api.title: API-First Everything
api.description: GraphQL, webhooks, automations, and integration kits for your accounting stack, marketing partners, and custom concierge flows.

checklist.title: Checklist of dominance
items: Full-funnel analytics connected to your data warehouse
Real-time collaboration across agents, marketing, finance, and legal
AI copilots drafting status updates, proposals, and marketing copy on command
Mobile and desktop apps for on-the-go brokerage pros
Enterprise security, compliance, and localization for LATAM operations
